016package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel;
017
018import android.content.Context;
019import android.util.Log;
020import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
021import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
022import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
023import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
024import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
025import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
026import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
027import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
028import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service.UserRepository;
031import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
032import java.util.List;
033import javax.inject.Inject;
034
035/**
036 * Provides access (for a UI controller or data-bound view) to the {@link User} entity instance
037 * corresponding to the current signed-in user, a user specified by its unique identifier (primary
038 * key value), and the full collection of users who have signed in to the app. This access includes
039 * persistence operations on individual {@link User} entity instances.
040 */
041@SuppressWarnings("unused")
042@HiltViewModel
043public class UserViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
044
045  private final UserRepository repository;
046  private final MutableLiveData<Long> currentUserId;
047  private final LiveData<User> currentUser;
048  private final MutableLiveData<Long> userId;
049  private final LiveData<User> user;
050  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
051  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
052
053  @Inject
054  UserViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, UserRepository repository) {
055    this.repository = repository;
056    currentUserId = new MutableLiveData<>();
057    currentUser = Transformations.switchMap(currentUserId, repository::get);
058    userId = new MutableLiveData<>();
059    user = Transformations.switchMap(userId, repository::get);
060    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
061    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
062    fetchCurrentUser();
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Returns {@link LiveData} containing the {@link User} entity instance for the current signed-in
067   * user.
068   */
069  public LiveData<User> getCurrentUser() {
070    return currentUser;
071  }
072
073  /**
074   * Sets the unique identifier (primary key value) of the {@link User} entity instance to be
075   * retrieved by the {@link LiveData}-based query returned by {@link #getUser()}. Any
076   * {@link androidx.lifecycle.Observer observers} of the latter will be invoked (asynchronously) as
077   * a result of invoking this method.
078   *
079   * @param userId
080   */
081  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
082  public void setUserId(long userId) {
083    this.userId.setValue(userId);
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Returns {@link LiveData} containing the {@link User} entity instance specified in the most
088   * recent invocation of {@link #setUserId(long)}. If there are any
089   * {@link androidx.lifecycle.Observer observers} of the result returned by this method, the
090   * retrieval will be performed automatically on invocation of {@link #setUserId(long)}, and the
091   * observers will be invoked (asynchronously) with the result.
092   */
093  public LiveData<User> getUser() {
094    return user;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Returns the {@link LiveData} containing the full collection of {@link User} entity instances
099   * corresponding to all users who have signed in to the app (or at least, all users who have been
100   * signed in when this class has been instantiated).
101   */
102  public LiveData<List<User>> getUsers() {
103    return repository.getAll();
104  }
105
106  /**
107   * Adds or updates (asynchronously) the {@link User} entity instance referenced by {@code user} in
108   * the app's persistent data store. If any of the {@link LiveData} instances returned by
109   * {@link #getCurrentUser()}, {@link #getUser()}, or {@link #getUsers()} are being observed, the
110   * underlying retrievals will be re-executed (and the
111   * {@link androidx.lifecycle.Observer observers} invoked) automatically as an asynchronous
112   * consequence of invoking this method.
113   *
114   * @param user Instance of the {@link User} entity class to be added to or updated in the
115   *             persistent data store.
116   */
117  public void save(User user) {
118    repository
119        .save(user)
120        .subscribe(
121            (u) -> {
122            },
123            this::postThrowable,
124            pending
125        );
126  }
127
128  /**
129   * Removes (asynchronously) the {@link User} entity instance referenced by {@code user} from the
130   * app's persistent data store. If any of the {@link LiveData} instances returned by
131   * {@link #getCurrentUser()}, {@link #getUser()}, or {@link #getUsers()} are being observed, the
132   * underlying retrievals will be re-executed (and the
133   * {@link androidx.lifecycle.Observer observers} invoked) automatically as an asynchronous
134   * consequence of invoking this method.
135   *
136   * @param user Instance of the {@link User} entity class to be removed from the persistent data
137   *             store.
138   */
139  public void delete(User user) {
140    repository
141        .delete(user)
142        .subscribe(
143            () -> {
144            },
145            this::postThrowable,
146            pending
147        );
148  }
149
150  @Override
151  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
152    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
153    pending.clear();
154  }
155
156  private void fetchCurrentUser() {
157    repository
158        .getCurrent()
159        .subscribe(
160            (user) -> currentUserId.postValue(user.getId()),
161            this::postThrowable,
162            pending
163        );
164  }
165
166  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
167    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
168    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
169  }
170
171}
